title: Biden's Gun Ban Is Ineffective and Here's WHY
description:
Don’t let the media LIE to you. Joe Biden is coming after your guns, and we explain how. Speaking of media lies, they were busted LYING about Donald Trump again, and it will infuriate you. We also take a look at how everything Fauci got wrong about COVID is similar to everything he got wrong about AIDS. And what is BlackRock? You’re going to want to know ... #biden #blackrock #lafayettepark
